background_description: The scene features an outdoor exhibit with large, light-colored boulders displayed on beds of pale grey gravel. Paved dark grey pathways wind through these displays. In the background, there is dense green foliage consisting of various trees and bushes, under a clear blue sky. To the right, a modern building with a smooth, light grey concrete wall and a slanted reflective glass roof is visible. A utility box is also present near the building in the middle ground.
explanation: The image primarily depicts an outdoor geological exhibit and a natural/urban environment. No animals, insects, or fish are visible in the scene. Therefore, no organism is present for camouflage analysis, and no camouflage is detected.
